```{r, packages, echo=FALSE}
# Packages
if (!require('pacman')) install.packages('pacman'); library('pacman')
p_load(kableExtra)
```

```{r, kableME_func, echo=FALSE}
kableME <- function(some_table) {
some_table %>%  
  mutate(no = seq(nrow(.))) %>% select(no, names(.)) %>% 
  kable() %>% kable_styling(., "striped")
}
```
